extendedInfo.description: Father's Day is fast approaching and if you are looking for Dad-Friendly foods, we've got you covered! You'll get 20 recipes dads of all types are sure to love. Mom & the kids will love making them too!* Teriyaki Basted Broiled Steaks* Dad's Gone Fishing Catfish* Dad Doesn't Have to Grill Shrimp* Catalina Dressed Steaks* Three Cheese Garlic Wedges* Cajun Dipped Onion Rings* Southwest Fiesta Beans* Stuffed Potatoes in a Flash* Garlic and Bread Crumb Mushrooms* Swiss Cheese and Hash Brown Potato Pancakes* Spiced Up Cream Corn* Buttery Garlic and Onion Beans* Fill Dad up Baked Potato* Three Fruit and Nut Salad* Raspberry Topped Baked Cheesecake* Banana Spit Shortcake* Cinnamon and Sugar Sundaes* Brownie Mint Surprise* Cool Me off Citrus Slush* 10 Minute Strawberry PieInstall now!
